rules_text:
Creature spells you cast have improvise and inscribe. [i]( Your enchantments can help cast this spell. Each enchantment you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1} or one mana of that enchantment's colors.)[/i]
{2}{G}{U}: Create a token copy of target artifact or enchantment you control. Activate only as a sorcery.
